blogs.title: Hackathon
blogs.body: This is a better opportunity where one can learn and acquire new skills and also network with others with the same kind.This also may give a internship and maybe also a job. Enroll to the hackathon when an opportunity arises.
blogs.author: Kennedy

blogs.title: Safaricom ke
blogs.body: The network company 'safaricom' are going to host a five-day hackathon at moi university starting from 12 july,2022 at Moi university
blogs.author: muthuri

blogs.title: Hackathon preparation
blogs.body:
Practice data structures and alogarithms in language you are comfortable with.
Attempt many leetcode and codechef challenges a many as possible.
blogs.author: Kennedy

blogs.title: Introduction to React js
blogs.body: React is a best frame work when it comes to javascript programming language. It give a website a nice and interactive page to interact with and also renders pages very fast through avoiding sending request to the server whenever the user requests a certain route.
blogs.author: damaris

blogs.title: Database
blogs.body: This Blog-web uses JSON to store data the user inputs. The JSON is used instead of local or online database.
blogs.author: muthuri

blogs.title: Github
blogs.body: The Blog-web will be pushed to Kennedymuthuri github page. you can clone/download the code or fork the project to contribute.
blogs.author: damaris

blogs.title: Next project
blogs.body:
The project will use React, Node js as a backend and mongodb as database.
MERN-STACK.
blogs.author: Kennedy
